Halal Pakistani & Indian Food for Kids & Adult Birthdays

Birmingham's Best Halal Birthday Catering

Make your birthday party memorable with authentic Pakistani and Indian catering from LUXE VENUE. Whether it's a children's birthday party at home, an adult milestone celebration, or a family gathering, we deliver delicious halal food that everyone loves. Our birthday catering service covers all Birmingham areas with hot, fresh food delivered right to your venue or home.

Our birthday party menu includes crowd-pleasers: crispy samosas, spicy chicken pakoras, juicy seekh kebabs, aromatic chicken biryani, flavorful lamb karahi, mild butter chicken for kids, garlic naan, pilau rice, and sweet gulab jamun. For children's parties, we offer kid-friendly options with less spice and fun finger foods. All ingredients are 100% halal certified and prepared fresh on the day of your party.

We handle the complete catering setup - delivering hot food in professional chafing dishes, setting up the buffet table, providing serving utensils, and including disposable plates and cutlery for easy cleanup. Perfect for home parties, garden celebrations, community centre events, or hired party venues across Birmingham. From intimate gatherings of 20 to large birthday bashes with 200+ guests, we've got you covered.

Birthday Catering FAQs

How much does Pakistani birthday party catering cost in Birmingham?

Birthday party catering starts from ¬£15 per person for kids parties and ¬£16-18pp for adult celebrations. Our halal menu includes samosas, chicken pakoras, seekh kebabs, biryani, curries, rice, naan, and desserts. Prices include complete setup, serving dishes, and disposable plates for easy cleanup. Minimum order 20 guests.

Do you provide halal birthday catering for kids parties?

Yes! We specialize in halal birthday party food for children and families. Kid-friendly options include chicken nuggets, pizza samosas, mini burgers, fries, biryani, mild curries, and traditional sweets. All food is 100% halal certified and prepared fresh. Perfect for home parties, community centres, or hired venues.

Can you deliver birthday party catering to homes in Birmingham?

Absolutely! We deliver birthday catering throughout Birmingham to homes, gardens, community centres, and party venues. Our team sets up the buffet, provides chafing dishes to keep food hot, and includes all serving utensils and disposable plates. Free delivery for orders of 100+ guests. Setup and collection service available.

What Pakistani and Indian dishes are popular for birthday parties?

Popular choices include: chicken tikka, samosas, pakoras, seekh kebabs, chicken biryani, lamb karahi, pilau rice, garlic naan, vegetable curry, raita, and gulab jamun. We offer buffet-style service with a mix of starters, mains, and desserts. Custom menus available for dietary requirements or themed parties.

Need a Birthday Party Venue?

Don't have a party venue? LUXE VENUE offers a beautiful event space in Birmingham perfect for birthday celebrations up to 70 guests.
